rules_text:
Deathtouch
[i]Binding Spirit[/i] – Whenever Yuri, Ashen Lord deals combat damage to a player, put a stun counter on target tapped creature that player controls.
[i]Clever Wolf[/i] – {2}{B}: Goad target creature. Activate this ability only if Yuri attacked this turn. [i](Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)[/i]
